author: Ernst
title: Jumping Snakes : poor jumping ability but a good additional set.
review:
Overall 4 bricks : A nice little set and a great addition for the young Ninjago fans. The set gives you the Jay ZX minifigure and catapult with 2 snakes. The functionality of the catapult can be called poor but overall considering the content and price a 4 brick reward.

 

Building 3 bricks : The catapult too launch the snakes is the only thing to built and not hard to do which is normal considering the size of the set. Only a shame that it's not a very good functioning catapult, looks good but works poorly.

 

Parts 5 bricks : Great minifigure, 2 snakes, a sword and a load of usefull small pieces.

 

Playability 4 bricks : For the young Ninjago fan of course great playbility, would have been 5 bricks with a better working catapult.

 

Value 5 bricks : We got this set as a gift but the normal price will be I think some €5,00 to €7,50 for a set like this which is ok considering the good content.

author: Slobrojoe
title: Rip off jumping snakes...
review:
This set is part of the Ninjago line and contains key characters and scenes.

Packet/Instructions

Double-sided instructions booklet with simple and easy to follow steps.

Build

It takes a maximum of 5 minutes for basically anyone. Has a golden katana and small snakes that are key in the Ninjago themes, are light green. It uses an unnecessary amount of pieces for what it is (a see-saw with a couple of snakes). The jumping snake effect is very exaggerated on the packet.

Minifig

Includes lightning-master Jay with a nicely printed torso and a silver three-quarter star on helmet.

Despite the rip off jumping snakes, the minifig doesn't disappoint and is a decent poly bag add-on.
